group_1.narration: After I found out that Papa had given up on saving@Magical Girls, I went to Yukuni with Rabi and@the others and heard what they had all been through...
They were trying to find salvation by making their@friends aware of the existence of Magical Girls,@but students in Yukuni somehow ended up@getting hurt and grew to resent them.

In researching women rumored to be Magical Girls,@Papa discovered that none of them were actually@known as Magical Girls.@He came to realize that anything that could@inconvenience the universe would be smothered.
It's the same as us becoming known@to the world as Magical Girls now.
Because if we're saved and the gap between hope@and despair closes, that means the universe won't@have the energy to sustain itself...
I can't just agree to give up on salvation@because my fate is in the hands of some@universal will, though.
That's why I have to see for myself what on@earth is going to happen in Kamihama,@where the existence of Magical Girls is@about to be spread.
Still, even if that theory does get confirmed,@if I feel that there is any hope for the future,@I'm going to hold it tight.

group_1.textLeft: Provided the message that Shigure Miyabi@sent to Sasha is true,
then Himena Aika has made her move to inform@people of the existence of Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: I can't believe she truly made it impossible@for anyone to eat or drink...

group_1.textLeft: ...It is enough to make humans understand the@difference between us and them.
An act that sets them apart from those of us@who seek words of comfort...
Even if the existence of Magical Girls becomes@known, this will create an unbridgeable chasm.

group_1.textRight: They wanted to establish Magical Girl Supremacy@and get to the very top, where no one can defy them.
Our current situation is the result of that goal...
Y'know, 'cause this isn't exactly comforting@for Magical Girls,
the universe's self-cleaning effect might not@even kick in.

group_1.textLeft: Well...
If humans become afraid of Magical Girls,@fewer of them will make contracts,
and the universe won't be able to get@the energy it needs.
Either way, it will try to protect itself.
Should this situation grow any further,@the consequences will be disastrous.

group_1.textRight: Like what happened to us back then...

group_1.textLeft: When many of us were engulfed in fire and@had our hearts broken...

group_1.textRight: Are you sayin' this could be even worse?

group_1.textLeft: Even so, Iroha Tamaki continues to resist@the will of the universe...
If she keeps denying the conflict between@Magical Girls, and honestly tries to reach out,
there is still the possibility of a peaceful future...

group_1.textRight: Fumumu!

group_1.textCenter: It seems she's been erasing her magic as@she goes, but we've finally caught on.

group_1.textLeft: Knowin' the princess, she musta gotten Mitama@to use her coordination abilities
to cover up her tracks.
But now we got her by the tail.
Whatever she's tryin' to play at, we'll snuff it out.
'Kay, I think we're all set for now.

group_1.textRight: Don't tell me you've been replying to Miyabi's@messages this whole time?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, she's been pelting me with questions.

group_1.textRight: So you've told her everything, then?
About how you asked Miwa to use her falsification@to change the goals of Kamihama's mayor,
and that you'd intended to get the townspeople@involved from the beginning...

group_1.textLeft: Yep, I've been totes honest about all that.

group_1.textRight: Does it make things easier if she's given up on you?

group_1.textLeft: This cutie's more than a little bummed about it,@but like...
I can't create the kind of future we both want,@y'know...?
'Cause every time I get dissed by Mama or@the people around me,
I think, "I've gotta put enough pressure on them@to make them say black is white".
Otherwise they're never gonna admit that me@and Hiko are in love.

group_1.textRight: Were you trying to get Miyu and I to leave as well
by giving it to us straight?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I was.
I'm surprised you two stayed with me anyway.

group_1.textRight: You and Lady San are gonna become gods@together, so of course we did!

group_1.textLeft: I too am relying on your plan in order to become@the god of the Fire Festival.
You agreed to the story of you becoming a wicked@god and myself becoming a good god, right?
There's no need for me to leave the@Neo-Magius now.
Thanks to you, we were able to track down Miyabi@and Azumi and get them out to the Union.
That's probably a good thing for you.

group_1.textRight: I wanted both of them to come back, but...
I guess we'd planned to get them to leave@from the start...

group_1.textLeft: At any rate, while all has been well so far,@what are our current chances of victory?

group_1.textRight: We lost the Feathers who learned what's going on,@like Shigure and Hagumu.
Ah, it sure looks pretty bad, doesn't it...?

group_1.textLeft: Hiko feels like it's all okie-dokie.
Besides, Shizuka bought us some time,@so we'll win for sure!
Even if dozens or hundreds of Magical Girls@attacked me and put me in a tight spot,
I can't do anything to change the situation anymore.

group_1.textRight: If you and Prince Hiko say so, then there's@no doubt about it!

group_1.textLeft: Yep, I've got a few tricks up my sleeve.@No prob.★

group_1.textRight: By the way, Your Highness, will you promise@me this one thing?

group_1.textLeft: What's that?

group_1.textRight: Do not touch the people of Hikarizuka.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, of course! Pinky promise!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* Lady San is sooo dignified and@wonderful today, too~.

group_1.narration: "Now, to get the good vibes going,@I think it's time to give the order!"
"I think all you Feathers who stuck@around this long see your ideal future in@Kamihama's situation!"
"Only 11 hours left until word of our existence@gets out! We're gonna spread Magical Girl@Supremacy and get to the top!"
"But I've got one teensy request for you all!@Everyone MUST obey this cutie's@final instructions!"
"Now then, let's do our best 'til the end!"
